implementation_timeline.action_items: Finalize job descriptions, post on district website and state teacher job bank.
HR screens licensure; committee scores using rubric and selects interview pool.
Panel interviews, teaching demonstrations, reference checks begin (continues through 04-05).
Finalists conduct lesson simulations and meet student focus group (continues through 04-20).
Selection committee submits recommendations to superintendent for approval.
HR emails contracts; candidates return signed documents within 10 business days.
Five-day orientation includes curriculum training, safety protocols, and equipment setup.
First student cohort begins; monitor enrollment, distribute materials, start classes.
